summary: An ordinance relating to zoning and providing for the rezoning of the south 50 feet of Lots 1, 2 and 3 and the south 50 feet of the west 10 feet of Lot 4, Block 33, Pontiac Addition; with respect to Use Districts, and amending Ordinance No. 45382, as amended, by addding thereto one new section numbered 2-365.
